attributes.review: I open the app thinking of would be like any other campaign but nooooo. I open the app and I see the worst thing I have ever seen in my life. attributes.review: My Dad asked me to set this app up on his iPhone. His phone is a little older and heâ€™s not too great at working tech but I figured this wouldnâ€™t be an issue. The app continuously crashed resulting in constantly trying to fix it for him. Whenever I was able to get the app actually up and running the entire phone would freeze and crash. Do you know how annoying it is to constantly help boomers with their phones?!?! FIX THIS APP ASAP PLEASE or take it off the App Store!! I expected more from someone trying to Make America Great. How can we fix our country without having basic tech that actually works!? Take this app off before it causes any further embarrassment to the wonderful success of the brilliant and great Trump Campaign.
attributes.title: App didnâ€™t deliver
